entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Peterborough
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:01 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 1.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 12:00 AM EST Sunday 01 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 1.7°C
Pressure: 101.0 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 1.7°C
Wind: NW 18 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this evening then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating near midnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening then light after midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or drizzle in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 3 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the evening with risk of freezing drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Clearing. High plus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
